mention.text: The novel flung half-open , where Hat , hair-pins , puffs , and paints are spread ; The mirror that has sucked your face Into its secret deep of deeps , And there mysteriously keeps Forgotten memories of grace ; And you half dressed and half awake , Your slant eyes strangely watching me , And I , who watch you drowsily , With eyes
